origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'DataAnalysisAPI.analyze_financing', 'description': 'This function analyzes financing data for a specific industry over a given time frame.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry to analyze, e.g., tech_innovation, healthcare.'}, {'name': 'dataCategory', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The category of data to analyze, e.g., financing, employment.'}, {'name': 'timeFrame', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time frame for the data analysis, e.g., annual, quarterly.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysisReport', 'description': 'The report detailing the analysis of the financing data.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 DataAnalysisAPI.analyze_financing, 它的参数输入如下: 'industry'是'tech_innovation', 'dataCategory'是'financing', 'timeFrame'是'annual'.
